div:
Introduction This resource is an observation of a Mammography Skin Lesion. It is typically one observation of a set of related observations that comprise a finding. This and its related obsevations are all referenced by a parent 'section' observation by that parents 'Observation.hasMember' element.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of:
what resources reference Mammography Skin Lesion
what resources Mammography Skin Lesion references
Review Status
NotReviewed
Member Fields
The following are parts of this observation that are contained within this resource.
Each field contains one data item and is stored as an item (slice) in the Observation.component element.
BiRads Assessment Category component [0..1]
Observed Change In Abnormality component [0..*]
Orientation of an abnormality component [0..1]
Size of an abnormality component [0..1]
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
Breast Body Location (Required) Fragment
BreastRad Observation NoValue Fragment
MG Common Targets Fragment
Observation Leaf Fragment
